headline.main: Warriors Will Navigate a 'Bizarre' Schedule to San Antonio
headline.print_headline: Warriors Will Navigate a 'Bizarre' Schedule to San Antonio

lead_paragraph: Chinese authorities have shut down activist Ye Haiyan's blogs and forced her to move from one city to another. Left with few options, she now produces socially conscious paintings to make a living and advocate for the rights of sex workers and people with HIV or AIDS.
